name: Tatsumi Restaurant: Tanuki-san no suteki suteeki
name_original: Tatsumi Restaurant: Tanuki-san no suteki suteeki
description:
Tanuki-san needs your help to get all the Kobe Beefs from the best restaurant of Hyogo: Tatsumi Restaurant! But avoid the shurikens or you will be in trouble.

This game was created using Javascript and Phaser (API) and it is an assignment for my University

(Tatsumi Restaurant is a fictious brand created for this game, all the images and animations were created by me)
